name: After Caster
description:
In the unusual future, one of the most popular pastimes are mage fights. Unfortunately, in this post-apocalyptic world ... there are no more magicians.

That is why the prisoners are fighting. Since the magicians are gone, no one can cast magic, however, they are left with wands that cast the spells by themselves.
Take control of a prisoner and win duels against others!
Throw your wand at your opponent and see what happens.

Only local multiplayer!

Xbox controller:
- B - join the game, throw the wand, raise your weapon
- A - jump
- Left stick - movement

Dualshock 4 controller:
- O - join the game, throw the wand, raise your weapon
-  X -  jump
- Left stick- movement

Keyboard:
- Player 1:
- Enter - join the game, throw the wand, pick up the weapon
- Right shift - jump
- Arrows - move
- Player 2:
- F1 - join the game
- I- throw your wand, raise your weapon
- O - jump
- WSAD - movement
